TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StickyNoteType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether a accepts text or ink.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this enumeration primarily to provide values for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.StickyNoteType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>.
An ink <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> can be handwritten on a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tpc](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-tpc-md.md)] or other hardware that supports handwritten input.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteType Ink = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteType Text = int32(0)
